oracle.pg.rdbms.pgql

Class BindValueInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.pg.rdbms.pgql.BindValueInfo

  • public class BindValueInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages information about bind values used in a PGQL query.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Returns the value type for this bind variable determined from the set method previously used for this bind variable's parameter index.
      java.util.List<java.lang.Object> getSqlBvList()
      Returns the SQL bind value list for this processed query
      java.lang.String processBindVariables(java.lang.String pgqlToSqlString)

    • Method Detail

      • getBindValueInfo

        public static BindValueInfo getBindValueInfo()
        Factory method for getting a BindValueInfo instance

      • getBindVarType

        public oracle.pgql.lang.ir.QueryExpression.ExpressionType getBindVarType(oracle.pgql.lang.ir.QueryExpression.BindVariable bv)
                                                                  throws PgqlToSqlException
        Returns the value type for this bind variable determined from the set method previously used for this bind variable's parameter index.
        Parameters:
        bv - the bind variable to return the type for
        Returns:
        the type for bv
        Throws:
        PgqlToSqlException

      • getSqlBvList

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Object> getSqlBvList()
        Returns the SQL bind value list for this processed query
        Returns:
        the SQL bind value list

      • processBindVariables

        public java.lang.String processBindVariables(java.lang.String pgqlToSqlString)
        Returns a new String that is the result of replacing all encoded bind variables in pgqlToSqlString with "?". In addition, a list of SQL bind values and a mapping of PGQL bind value index positions to SQL bind value index positions is constructed.
        Parameters:
        pgqlToSqlString - a SQL string that contains encoded bind variables
        Returns:
        a new String that is the result of replacing all encoded bind variables in pgqlToSqlString with "?"

      • setTimestamp

        public void setTimestamp(int parameterIndex,
                         java.sql.Timestamp x)
        Sets the designated parameter to the given Java Timestamp value. Timestamp values are assumed to be in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
        Parameters:

        x - the parameter value
